work.title: Tech Lead
description: Lead development of, and architected a web-based accommodation and property discovery platform focusing on Africa's rental and listing market
Designed the technical architecture built on Supabase and GraphQL for rapid development and scalability
Created sustainable business and payment models ensuring revenue generation for local hosts and agents
Oversaw brand development, product roadmap, and customer experience alignment with market needs
achievements: Successfully launched platform in Rwanda market
Built sustainable revenue model for local agents

work.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer (Freelance)
description: Delivered end-to-end web applications, platforms, and systems for diverse international and local clients as a 5-star rated Upwork freelancer
Developed RESTful and GraphQL APIs integrated with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Supabase backend services
Implemented serverless architecture solutions and cloud-based backend services, optimizing costs and scalability
Applied automated testing practices and CI/CD pipelines to ensure reliable deployments

work.title: Co-Founder & Chief Technology Officer
description: Architected and deployed a scalable digital real estate platform with integration to external APIs for land registry data, tax calculations, and loan verification systems
Directed the design and deployment of AI-powered systems including recommender models, fraud detection, and NLP-based assistants for underserved users
Led a cross-functional engineering team of 5+ developers, conducting code reviews, technical mentorship, and sprint planning using Agile methodology
Designed and optimized database schemas, stored procedures, and triggers in PostgreSQL, improving query performance by 40%
Implemented DevOps best practices including Docker containerization and deployment to Microsoft Azure, achieving 99.5% system uptime
achievements: Achieved 99.5% system uptime through robust DevOps practices
Improved query performance by 40% through database optimization
Built NLP-based accessibility features for underserved users

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed core backend services and APIs using Node.js, PostgreSQL, RESTful, and GraphQL, enabling efficient property search and secure transactions
Built and maintained robust authentication and authorization systems using JWT and OAuth protocols, achieving zero security breaches
Created database schemas with complex relationships, implementing stored procedures and triggers for automated business logic
Conducted thorough integration testing and production debugging, reducing reported bugs by 30%
Implemented caching strategies and database indexing that reduced API response times by 35%
achievements: Reduced reported bugs by 30% through comprehensive testing
Reduced API response times by 35% via caching and indexing
Zero security breaches with robust auth implementation

work.title: Web Developer Aparenticeship
description: Built and maintained responsive web applications using React, Redux, and TypeScript, improving user experience across devices
Collaborated in agile sprints, delivering features on schedule while maintaining high-quality code standards
Implemented automated testing frameworks to ensure feature reliability, code quality, and maintainability
Mentored junior developers through code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions, fostering a collaborative engineering culture
achievements: Mentored junior developers in best practices

work.title: Co-Founder & CTO
description: Developed a pioneering AI and IoT-powered mobility platform designed to address Rwanda's public transport challenges
Led system architecture, business design, and technical direction during incubation at the AI & IoT Innovation Program
Managed early partnerships with local transport operators and regulators to explore pilot implementation
achievements: Selected for AI & IoT Innovation Program incubation
Built foundation for future innovation ventures

Applying academic knowledge to real-world entrepreneurial ventures

Applied ML concepts to real-world projects including recommender systems and NLP
